reviewText: Purchased the DVD while in the Outer Banks as a Christmas gift for my wife.  DVD would not run on any DVD, BD or computer we have.  Very disappointing.
Its nice to see a dvd on lighthouses, Hopefully there will always be people who will preserve these historical sites. And film their historical value for us all to view.

Very educational found a couple things i missed on my last visit ..
now i know..Video is short but educational.
I will review next trip love the outer banks.
I ordered the DVD, just before we left to go to the Outerbanks.  Got alot of information, and knew what to look for, on our trip.  Many thanks! Phyllis

We really enjoy our "Lighthouses Of The Outer Banks" DVD. Our family has been traveling to the Outer Banks for years.. and we fell in love with the lighthouses there. This video is beautifully photographed and edited.. it's just as if you were touring the lighthouses themselves. A must if you are an Outer Banks or lighthouse lover!
